snippet: A decree from Syrian leader granted amnesty for all crimes except “acts of terrorism,” raising hopes among Syrians with relatives in detention.
abstract: Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad issues decree granting general amnesty for all crimes except 'acts of terrorism,' raising tentative hopes among Syrians with relatives in detention.
lead_paragraph: A decree from Syrian leader granted amnesty for all crimes except “acts of terrorism,” raising hopes among Syrians with relatives in detention.

headline.main: President Bashar al-Assad of Syria Declares ‘General Amnesty’ for Prisoners
headline.print_headline: ‘Amnesty’ for Crimes Is Declared in Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
